description:
The Branch Manager, Otoo, returns to Wagnaria for the first time in a while. Everyone rejoices in the wide variety of souvenirs that he brings back—except for one vengeful nemesis.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yachiyo and Sato, and Otoo-san Returns
Yachiyo to Kyouko to Satou... to, Kaette Kita Otoo-san
八千代と杏子と佐藤... と, 帰ってきた音尾さん
